teammembers.bio: In 2015, a group of women at the University of North Carolina at Charlotte started an organization called 'Queen City Gems'. Their goal was to bring together a group of women who all shared a common love of music. Later, in 2018 the 'Queen City Gems' became a Colony of Sigma Alpha Iota. In 2020, the group officially became a chapter with twenty-one members, two whom are alumni.
